name: Chainless
description:
Escape from prison and swing your way through the city, avoid various obstacles, don't get caught and try not to fall.
Compete with friends and rise to the top of the leaderboard!

VR Fitness Insider review: 4/5

Features:
  • Realistic swinging-physics
  • Global leaderboard & personal statistics
  • Achievements
  • Frequent updates
  • Randomly generated environment every new run!
  • Comfort settings ("anti-motion sickness")

Bonus:
  • Humor & easter eggs
  • Feel (and look) like Tarzan
  • Sore arms

Planned features:
  • Multiplayer mode! - in the works
  • Cosmetic appearance
  • Multiple environments

Escape, swing, fall, repeat.


"But, why is the game called Chainless when there is so many chains?"
Ssshhh

"Why are the chains floating?"
... sshhhhh less questions more swinging.

I designed this game because I personally felt like VR lacked content that could be played for more than just a few hours - that was my goal, which I hope I have achieved in your opinion - if not, feedback is appreciated in the Discussion section!
Happy swinging!
